actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage. The minotaur can choose to make the attack with advantage. If it does so  attacks against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the minotaur moves at least 10 feet straight towards the target before the attack  the attack deals an extra 9 (2d8) damage  and the target makes a DC 16 Strength saving throw  being pushed up to 10 feet away and falling prone on a failure.

special_abilities.name: Labyrinthine Recall
special_abilities.desc: The minotaur can perfectly recall any route it has traveled.
